Our early KPIs are ambitious: a 15% lift in activation rates and a +5 boost in NPS. To ensure quality, weâ€™ve built in safeguards like a profanity filter and a daily token cap of 5k per tenant. Beta launch is just two weeks away! Want early access? Vote in our Slack pilot poll and help shape the future!
